title: Artist
description: A person engaged in the visual art of painting, shown holding a palette and paintbrush.
apple_vendor_description: The artist emoji on Apple devices captures a creative individual with a focused, inspired expression, holding a palette and paintbrush with a touch of realistic detail. Apple's design imbues this emoji with a sense of passion and artistic dedication, showcasing subtle highlights and a smooth, rendered texture. It's a perfect way to represent creativity, craftsmanship, or someone who works in the arts.
